title: paravasa maayanura
sahitya:
paravasha mAyanurA nA dEhamu paravasha mAyanurA nA dEhamu

anupallavi

 sarasija nAbha nI caritamulu vinagA

caraNam 1

 bhUsura kulamuna buTTi ajAmiLUDu puNya karmamula viDaci 
vAsga caNDALa satini gUDivarNa dharmamula nadalI 
AlasarOyaka antaya kAlamuna Atmaja pEru beTTi piluvagA
dAsa varula barampi dhanyuni jEsi dayatO nElina mahimalu vinagA
 
caraNam 2

 janakuni toDapai nekku bhAgyamu tanaku kaluga lEdanu khEdamuna 
vana munakEgi nArada mauni vasamu sEyucu madana janaka ninu vadalalE 
nanucu ghanamaina tapamu jEsina dhruvuni kanikaramuna brOcina mahivinagA
 
caraNam 3

 saumitri nidrA hAramulu modalu sakala saukhyamulu maraci
nEmamutO padunAlugu yeNDalu nErpuna paluparicaryala kaikoni 
prEma bhaktuDagu bharatuni vaNTi priya sOdarulikha lErani balikina
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata vAkyamulu vinagA 
priya sOdarulikha lErani
